Description: Handle fragment of pottery transport amphora, red fabric with grey core, micaceous with white inclusions. Circular stamp.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Leiden University, Faculty of Archaeology. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Name, Donax. For the group see http://www.amphoralex.org/amphores/AE/AmphoresAE1.php
Bibliographic references: van de Wiel 1968 / Verzameling ceramiek en Terracotta's Archaeologisch Instituut der Rijksuniversiteit Leiden (p. 6, N 19, pl. 1, N 19)
Prins de Jong 1925 / Scherben aus Naukratis: Aus der Sammlung des Universitäts-Professors Dr Fr W Freih von Bissing (p. 51, no. 10, pl. II.4)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JA.044)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: T.2483 (Musée Scheurleer (The Hague) Registration number)
